name: FIFA 20
summary: FIFA 20 is a football simulation video game published by Electronic Arts as part of the FIFA series. It is the 27th installment in the FIFA series, and was released on 27 September 2019 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.
info:
• 开发: Electronic Arts
  • 发行: Electronic Arts
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: SPG
  • 游戏引擎: Frostbite 3
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2019年9月27日
